summary: Completed all implementation tasks for the Beauty Booking Module. Created module foundation (module.json, service providers, config files), all 12 database migrations with proper indexes and foreign keys, all 12 entity models with relationships and scopes, 6 service classes for business logic, 2 traits for notifications and booking calculations, all route definitions for admin/vendor/customer/vendor API panels, all controllers (Admin, Vendor, Customer API, Vendor API), 5 email classes for notifications, all Blade views for admin and vendor panels, frontend assets (JavaScript for calendar and booking forms, CSS), database seeder with default categories and commission settings, and integration points extending Store and User models with beauty booking relationships. All code follows PSR-12 standards with bilingual comments (Persian + English) and uses existing system helpers for uploads, notifications, translations, wallet, payments, and chat.
current_status: All 14 implementation tasks completed successfully. The Beauty Booking Module is now fully implemented with: Phase 1 (Foundation) ✓, Phase 2 (Migrations) ✓, Phase 3 (Models) ✓, Phase 4-5 (Services & Traits) ✓, Phase 6 (Routes) ✓, Phase 7 (Controllers) ✓, Phase 8 (Emails) ✓, Phase 9 (Views) ✓, Phase 10 (Frontend Assets) ✓, Phase 11 (Integration) ✓, Phase 12 (Seeder) ✓. The module is ready for testing and activation via 'php artisan module:publish BeautyBooking'. All files follow existing Rental module patterns and integrate seamlessly with the 6amMart system.
